Title: Time FootnoteÂ·X
Text:
It's been so humid lately that I'm afraid it's going to be Retroact Rain again, so I found a weapon wreck to get out of the rain.
I came across a pair of siblings who were also stopping here, they were small and a bit wary of strangers, they looked like runaway kids.
I was going to call Mornguard from the camp over there to come over and take the people back, but the two surprised me by pouncing on me and almost bumping into the brim of my hat.
"Uncle, please, don't take us back. My sister and I just want to visit the sea of flowers over there." The larger boy looked at me sincerely, but I was momentarily stumped.
It's just that, who doesn't have a bit of curiosity when they're young. Anyway, I haven't gotten much lately, so why don't I just accompany them to take a look, just as a chance to go to Sea of Flames.
